definition: Chifeng prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia
red/scarlet/bare/naked
(of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels
old variant of 峰[feng1]
Chifeng prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: No. 5 working area in a uranium-molybdenum mine of Chifeng was mined illegally.
sentences.chinese: 赤峰某铀钼矿5号矿点曾遭盗采。

sentences.english: The wild leguminous forage germplasm resources in rangeland of north part of Chifeng were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 对赤峰北部野生豆科牧草种质资源进行了调查研究。

sentences.english: "Chifeng" because there is a city northeastern red ochre peaks of the name.
sentences.chinese: “赤峰”因城区东北角有一座赭红色的山峰而得名。

sentences.english: This paper is on case studies in Chifeng City of Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 本文是关于内蒙古赤峰市文钟镇的个案研究。

sentences.english: Results The Inner Mongolian Chifeng has discovered Ischnopsylla (Hexactenopsylla) hexactenus .
sentences.chinese: 结果内蒙古赤峰市发现了六栉蝠蚤。

sentences.english: At the moment, another brother of mine is just driving car to a hospital in Chifeng City.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，我的另一个弟弟正驱车赶往赤峰市一家医院。

sentences.english: Chifeng area during the warring states period of DongHu.
sentences.chinese: 赤峰地区战国时期属东胡。

sentences.english: This article has expounded the distribution and ecologic character of Chinese Ephedra in Chifeng, Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了内蒙古赤峰地区草麻黄的分布和生态特性。

sentences.english: The second part is the evaluation of tourism product exploitative condition in Chifeng.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，赤峰市旅游产品开发条件评价。

sentences.english: In the first memorial year of mother, I went back to Chifeng from Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 在母亲的第一个祭年，我从北京回到赤峰。
